verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Oh it's good to know that we
Are finally set free,
By the birth of the Father in His sons,
And now we are enjoying
The blessings of His wellsprings
As we move in the oneness of His son.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I've got glory coming at me from both sides,
I've got glory flowing over me in tides,
I've got glory shining at me like sunshine, it seems,
And it's You, my Father, beloved Guide.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
We speak His word throughout the land
As we sit at His right hand,
Our names are written in the book with His blood;
As we move in unity
We shall set the captives
And we long to hear the words:
"Well done, My son!"
